product_name: Saucony Xodus 4.0 GTX Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The waterproof Saucony Xodus 4.0 GTX trail-running shoes tackle tough terrain with nimble, cushioned performance so you can get out and go, even on sloppy wet trails. GORE-TEX(R) waterproof liners supply a great fit and let feet breathe while protecting them from the weather, keeping feet dry and comfortable. Gusseted tongues keep trail debris out; uppers are also compatible with gaiters (not included) for increased protection. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a shorter, lower impact stride than traditional running shoes do. Midfoot support bands are integrated into the lacing for an snug overall fit and feel when you cinch the laces tight; shoes include lace garages on the tongues. Thermoplastic urethane plates provide torsional rigidity and protect feet from rocks. Saucony Xodus 4.0 GTX trail-running shoes have Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with multidirectional lugs, providing aggressive traction for tackling trails.
short_description: The waterproof Saucony Xodus 4.0 GTX trail-running shoes tackle tough terrain with nimble, cushioned performance so you can get out and go, even on sloppy wet trails.
